nodes.text: The Blatant Beks were a swoop gang participating in the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally around 3626 BBY.

The Blatant Beks were a swoop gang who favoured the noise and explosions in the swoop track. The gang was often confused with the Hidden Beks who shared their namesake, which annoyed their leader Bangcap. Most of the Blatant Beks were obsessed with pyrotechnics, making it their signature.
The Blatant Beks were created by Bangcap and Old Morta at some point before the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally.
